entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 04:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NNW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
